actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 95-520, to extend the deadline for reporting on hospital care and medical services furnished by the Veteran's Administration in Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends until February 1, 1981, the deadline for reporting on hospital care and medical services furnished by the Veterans' Administration in Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 95-520, to extend the deadline for reporting on hospital care and medical services furnished by the Veteran's Administration in Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands, and for other purposes.
